H0.text: The reaction rate indicates the speed at which a reaction proceeds.

H1.text: The transform rate indicates the speed at which a reaction proceeds.

H2.text: Time zone is the indicator of the speed at which a reaction proceeds.

H3.text: Reaction scale indicates the speed at which a reaction proceeds.

A4.text: The reaction rate or rate of reaction is the speed at which a chemical reaction takes place, defined as proportional to the increase in the concentration of a product per unit time and to the decrease in the concentration of a reactant per unit time.
